report.name: refpca42

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: select cm.clisigle DirMO, substr(TO_CHAR(lb.codsg, 'FM0000000'), 1, 5) CODEDP, pack_rep_refpca4.f_trityp(lb.typproj) TRITYPE, -- 25 c lb.typproj PTYPE, DECODE (pack_rep_refpca4.f_trityp(lb.typproj), 'PLAN' , 'PLAN INFORMATIQUE', 'T5', 'STRUCTURE', 'T6', 'EXPLOITAION', 'T7', 'ABSENCES', 'T8', 'ACTIVITES TECHNIQUES', 'ERREUR') LIBTYPE, lb.airt REF, substr(app.alibel,1,35) REFLIB, -- 35 c lb.clicode PCMOUVRA, lb.pid PID, lb.codcamo CODCAMO, substr(lb.pnom,1,18) LIBPROJET, -- 18 c lb.codsg CODEDPG, substr(r.rnom,1,8) CHEFPROJET, -- 8 c nvl(conso.cusag,0) CONSOJH, nvl(floor(budg.reestime),0) REESTJH, floor(nvl(budg.bpmontme,0)) PROPOJH, nvl(budg.bnmont,0) NOTIFJH, nvl(budg.anmont,0) ARBITJH, nvl(floor(budg.reserve),0) RESERJH, nvl(floor(budg1.bpmontme),0) PROPOJH1 from ligne_bip lb , application app, budget budg , budget budg1, consomme conso, ressource r, client_mo cm where lb.airt = app.airt and lb.pcpi = r.ident and lb.clicode = cm.clicode and lb.pid = budg.pid (+) and lb.pid = conso.pid (+) and lb.pid = budg1.pid (+) and ( (conso.cusag <> 0 AND conso.cusag is not null ) OR (budg.reestime <> 0 AND budg.reestime is not null ) OR (budg.bpmontme <> 0 AND budg.bpmontme is not null ) OR (budg.bnmont <> 0 AND budg.bnmont is not null ) OR (budg.reserve <> 0 AND budg.reserve is not null ) OR (budg.anmont <> 0 AND budg.anmont is not null ) OR (budg1.bpmontme <> 0 AND budg1.bpmontme is not null ) ) &P_where order by CODEDP, TRITYPE, PCMOUVRA, REFLIB, PTYPE, PID, CODCAMO, LIBPROJET, CODEDPG, CHEFPROJET

function.name: afterpform
rtrimetoile
cf_lastmonthdate
cf_an1
cf_an0
